emptyStateNoContent.title: Nothing Here Yet!
emptyStateNoContent.description: Looks like there’s no content here right now. Check back later or try something else.

failedToLoadPage.title: Something Went Wrong
failedToLoadPage.description: There was a system error while loading the page. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.

otherActiveSession.title: Session Error!
otherActiveSession.description: Access from this device is currently unavailable for security reasons. This may be due to another login or a system issue. Please try again or use a different device.

noInternetConnection.title: Oops! You're Offline
noInternetConnection.description: It looks like you're not connected to the internet. Check your Wi-Fi or mobile data and try again once you're back online.

pageNotFound.title: Oops! This Page Is Missing
pageNotFound.description: Looks like this page doesn’t exist or got moved. Try checking the URL or head back home.

tooManyRequest.title: Hang Tight! We're a Bit Busy
tooManyRequest.description: Looks like our servers are handling a lot right now. Give it a moment and try again.

underMaintenance.title: We’ll Be Right Back!
underMaintenance.description: We're making some updates to keep things running smoothly. Check back soon!

userRestriction.title: Oops! You Can’t Access This
userRestriction.description: Looks like you don’t have permission to view this. Double-check your access or reach out for help.
